metadata.name: a night with the mfers 1
metadata.description:
the inaugural unofficially official gathering of the mfers  
brooklyn NYC, summer '22  
  
an open edition to memorialize _the_ mfers pizza party.  
0.0069 ETH, 48 hours  
  
we needed a poster to announce the party, so i whipped this one up. i took inspiration from my roots helping promote punk & metal shows when i was a teen. we would mass print & photocopy these things and just blast them all over town. mfers take me back to those days of unapologetic, chaotic creation.  
  
the mfer community took a collective action to throw this party. mfer lexito threw us a banger in bushwick, and the mfers showed up. no team, no roadmap, no dictators, no masters. mfers do what they want, and they jus gettin START (real ones omit the 'ED', ask pcm or mcx).  
   
90% of proceeds go to mferbuilderDAO.eth  
an open system for mferish creatooors  
https://mferbuilderdao.org  
  
...and 10% to zhoug.eth for some operational dough  
yr mfer out here tryna keep the lights on <3  
  
no royalty, cc0, do what u want cuz we all mfers,  
always has been  
   
(insanely huge shoutout to anonChickenLegs for fronting me for the gas last minute to ship this edition out because i'm a dumbass. this mfer is a real one. don't fade the chicken)  
    
love,  
-zhoug <3
